equipment.name: Lidless Wall
base_affixes: <text class='c_label'>Lucky Hit:</text> While you have an active <text class='c_important'>Bone Storm</text>, hitting an enemy outside of a <text class='c_important'>Bone Storm</text> has up to a <text class='c_random'>36.94%</text> chance to spawn an additional <text class='c_important'>Bone Storm</text> at their location. equipment.name: Molten Lotus
base_affixes: +4.5% Critical Strike Chance Against Injured Enemies
strikethrough_affixes: When a segment of <text class='c_important'>Bone Prison</text> is destroyed or expires, it deals <text class='c_random'>0.09</text> damage in an area around itself.
6.5% Damage Reduction from Shadow Damage Over Time-Affected Enemies
added_affixes: Casting <text class='c_important'>Blood Lance</text> will consume <text class='c_important'><u>Blood Orbs</u></text> to also conjure lances from them. Each additional <text class='c_important'>Blood Lance</text> deals <text class='c_random'>44.49%</text> of normal damage and prioritizes targeting un-lanced enemies.
5.6% Essence Cost Reduction

equipment.name: Boneweave Faulds
base_affixes: Consuming a <text class='c_important'>Corpse</text> has a <text class='c_random'>40.41%</text> chance to spawn a <text class='c_important'><u>Blood Orb</u></text>.

equipment.name: Blood Artisan's Cuirass
base_affixes: When you pick up <text class='c_random'>10.5</text> <text class='c_important'><u>Blood Orbs</u></text>, a free <text class='c_important'>Bone Spirit</text> is spawned, dealing bonus damage based on your current Life percent.

equipment.name: Doom Treads
base_affixes: Critical Strikes grant <text class='c_random'>21.33%</text> Movement Speed for <text class='c_number'>1.5</text> second, up to <text class='c_number'>9</text> seconds.
strikethrough_affixes: 58.5 Strength
added_affixes: +(2) Rank of Corpse Tendrils

equipment.name: Band
base_affixes: Casting <text class='c_important'>Blood Lance</text> will consume <text class='c_important'><u>Blood Orbs</u></text> to also conjure lances from them. Each additional <text class='c_important'>Blood Lance</text> deals <text class='c_random'>66.74%</text> of normal damage and prioritizes targeting un-lanced enemies.

equipment.name: Dream Catcher
base_affixes: <text class='c_important'>Blood Mist</text> leaves a trail of <text class='c_important'>Desecrated Ground</text> that lasts for <text class='c_number'>6</text> seconds and deals <text class='c_random'>0.56</text> Shadow damage per second to enemies who stand in it. Your Movement Speed is no longer reduced while <text class='c_important'>Blood Mist</text> is active.
8.14% Damage Reduction from Shadow Damage Over Time-Affected Enemies
<text class='c_label'>Lucky Hit:</text> Up to a +17.45% Chance to Slow

equipment.name: Loop
strikethrough_affixes: Damaging enemies with <text class='c_important'>Sever</text> has a <text class='c_random'>26.08%</text> chance to spawn a pool of <text class='c_important'>Blight</text> under the target that deals <text class='c_random'>104.33%</text> bonus damage. This effect can only happen once every <text class='c_number'>4.5</text> seconds.
added_affixes: Each cast of <text class='c_important'>Blood Lance</text> will launch an additional <text class='c_important'>Blood Lance</text> at a Nearby enemy when it first hits an enemy that is already lanced, dealing <text class='c_random'>69.8%</text> of normal damage.

equipment.name: Warlord Gauntlets
base_affixes: <text class='c_label'>Lucky Hit:</text> Up to a +25.07% Chance to Slow
strikethrough_affixes: <text class='c_important'>Blood Mist</text> triggers <text class='c_important'>Corpse Explosion</text> on surrounding Corpses. When <text class='c_important'>Blood Mist</text> detonates a Corpse, its Cooldown is reduced by <text class='c_random'>0.66</text> seconds.
added_affixes: Gain <text class='c_random'>29.27%</text> increased Critical Strike Chance for <text class='c_number'>9</text> seconds when you cast <text class='c_important'>Corpse Tendrils</text>. You deal <text class='c_random'>58.53%</text> bonus Critical Strike Damage to enemies damaged by <text class='c_important'>Corpse Tendrils</text>.

base_affixes: +23.25% Critical Strike Damage with Bone Skills

+18.75% Damage to Shadow Damage Over Time-Affected Enemies
strikethrough_affixes: <text class='c_important'>Bone Spirit</text> deals increased damage based on distance traveled, up to <text class='c_random'>35.03%</text>.
added_affixes: <text class='c_important'>Blood Wave</text> fires two additional waves, each dealing <text class='c_random'>73.84%</text> less damage than the previous.

Gain <text class='c_random'>36.67%</text> increased damage to a set of damage types for <text class='c_number'>1.5</text> seconds.  This effect alternates between <text class='c_number'>2</text> sets: 
<li>Fire, Lightning, and Physical. 
<li>Cold, Poison, and Shadow.
added_affixes: Gain <text class='c_random'>29.99%</text> increased Critical Strike Chance for <text class='c_number'>9</text> seconds when you cast <text class='c_important'>Corpse Tendrils</text>. base_affixes: <text class='c_important'>Basic</text> Skills gain <text class='c_random'>44.56%</text> Attack Speed.

equipment.name: Band
base_affixes: While <text class='c_important'><u>Healthy</u></text>, <text class='c_important'><u>Blood Orbs</u></text> grant <text class='c_random'>28.5</text> Essence.

equipment.name: Adventurer's Boots
strikethrough_affixes: Your maximum number of Skeletal Warriors is increased by <text class='c_random'>2.8</text>.
added_affixes: <text class='c_important'>Blood Mist</text> triggers <text class='c_important'>Corpse Explosion</text> on surrounding Corpses. When <text class='c_important'>Blood Mist</text> detonates a Corpse, its Cooldown is reduced by <text class='c_random'>0.61</text> seconds.

equipment.name: Adventurer's Helm
base_affixes: Damaging an Elite enemy grants you a <text class='c_important'><u>Barrier</u></text> absorbing up to <text class='c_random'>2.05</text> damage for <text class='c_number'>15</text> seconds. This effect can only happen once every <text class='c_number'>45</text> seconds.

equipment.name: Archon Armor
strikethrough_affixes: You gain <text class='c_random'>1.39%</text> increased Armor for <text class='c_number'>5.6</text> seconds when you deal any form of damage, stacking up to <text class='c_random'>83.54%</text>.
added_affixes: You gain <text class='c_random'>1.44%</text> increased Armor for <text class='c_number'>5.6</text> seconds when you deal any form of damage, stacking up to <text class='c_random'>86.52%</text>.

equipment.name: Chain
base_affixes: Whenever your <text class='c_important'>Blood</text> Skills <text class='c_important'><u>Overpower</u></text> you gain <text class='c_random'>70.38%</text> Attack Speed for <text class='c_number'>6</text> seconds.

equipment.name: Boneweave Faulds
base_affixes: Consuming a <text class='c_important'>Corpse</text> has a <text class='c_random'>37.72%</text> chance to spawn a <text class='c_important'><u>Blood Orb</u></text>.

equipment.name: Mother's Embrace
base_affixes: If a <text class='c_important'>Core</text> Skill hits <text class='c_number'>6</text> or more enemies, <text class='c_random'>49.63%</text> of the Resource cost is refunded.

base_affixes: +24% Critical Strike Damage with Bone Skills

<li> <text class='c_important'>Blood Wave</text> creates <text class='c_important'>Desecrated Ground</text> as it travels, dealing <text class='c_random'>16.33</text> Shadow damage over <text class='c_number'>6</text> seconds
added_affixes: Casting <text class='c_important'>Blood Lance</text> will consume <text class='c_important'><u>Blood Orbs</u></text> to also conjure lances from them. <text class='c_label'>Lucky Hit:</text> Up to a +13.19% Chance to Stun
<text class='c_label'>Lucky Hit:</text> Up to a +13.19% Chance to Fear

equipment.name: Mother's Embrace
base_affixes: If a <text class='c_important'>Core</text> Skill hits <text class='c_number'>5.6</text> or more enemies, <text class='c_random'>46.32%</text> of the Resource cost is refunded.

equipment.name: Serpent's Bite
base_affixes: Each time the <text class='c_important'>Shadowblight</text> Key Passive deals damage to enemies, it increases the next <text class='c_important'>Shadowblight's</text> damage within <text class='c_number'>15</text> seconds by <text class='c_random'>64.07%</text>, stacking up to <text class='c_number'>7.5</text> times.
<text class='c_label'>Lucky Hit:</text> Up to a +7.05% Chance to Execute Injured Non-Elites

equipment.name: Warlord Boots
base_affixes: +30% Movement Speed for VALUE2 Seconds After Killing an Elite
strikethrough_affixes: <text class='c_important'>Blight's</text> defiled area, when spawned, pulls in enemies around the affected area.
added_affixes: Your maximum number of Skeletal Warriors is increased by <text class='c_random'>3</text>.

equipment.name: Sovereign Mail
strikethrough_affixes: When hit while not <text class='c_important'><u>Healthy</u></text>, a magical bubble is summoned around you for <text class='c_random'>6.96</text> seconds. While standing in the bubble, Players are <text class='c_important'><u>Immune</u></text>. Can only occur once every <text class='c_number'>135</text> seconds.
added_affixes: Your <text class='c_important'>Golem</text> has a <text class='c_random'>6.93%</text> chance to reduce its active Cooldown by <text class='c_number'>3</text> seconds and a <text class='c_random'>1.5</text> chance to spawn a Corpse each time it damages an enemy with its normal attack.

equipment.name: Band
strikethrough_affixes: Damaging enemies with <text class='c_important'>Sever</text> has a <text class='c_random'>27.04%</text> chance to spawn a pool of <text class='c_important'>Blight</text> under the target that deals <text class='c_random'>108.17%</text> bonus damage. This effect can only happen once every <text class='c_number'>4.2</text> seconds.
added_affixes: <text class='c_label'>Lucky Hit:</text> Up to a <text class='c_number'>14%</text> chance to generate <text class='c_random'>58.37</text> Essence when hitting a <text class='c_important'><u>Vulnerable</u></text> enemy.

equipment.name: Adventurer's Pants
base_affixes: You gain <text class='c_random'>1.64%</text> increased Armor for <text class='c_number'>6</text> seconds when you deal any form of damage, stacking up to <text class='c_random'>98.61%</text>.
+21% Damage for VALUE2 Seconds After Killing an Elite

equipment.name: Jade Relic
strikethrough_affixes: Skills deal up to <text class='c_random'>25.62%</text> increased damage based on your available Primary Resource when cast, receiving the maximum benefit while you have full Primary Resource.
added_affixes: Gain <text class='c_random'>24.32%</text> increased Critical Strike Chance for <text class='c_number'>9</text> seconds when you cast <text class='c_important'>Corpse Tendrils</text>. You deal <text class='c_random'>48.64%</text> bonus Critical Strike Damage to enemies damaged by <text class='c_important'>Corpse Tendrils</text>.

equipment.name: Amulet
base_affixes: <text class='c_label'>Lucky Hit:</text> When you hit a Crowd Controlled enemy, there is up to a <text class='c_random'>48.52%</text> chance for that Crowd Control effect to spread to another unaffected enemy.
6.24% Damage Reduction from Shadow Damage Over Time-Affected Enemies
+(0.8+0.6*2) Rank of the Death's Reach Passive

base_affixes: <text class='c_important'>Blight's</text> defiled area, when spawned, pulls in enemies around the affected area.
